alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 7:26AM CST until January 30 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Monroe, Wilcox and Clarke Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, considerable flooding of agricultural land. At 42.0 feet, water begins to inundate the Eureka Landing community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CST Monday the stage was 42.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 AM CST Monday was 42.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 43.0 feet, then fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 26.2 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
